\usepackage[tight]{minitoc}
\begin{document}
\dominitoc
\doparttoc
\newcommand\alfati{\ifinparttoc Alfa in parttoc
                   \else\ifinminitoc Alfa in minitoc
                        \else Alfa out subtoc
                        \fi
                   \fi}
\DeclareRobustCommand{\varsecti}[3]%
          {\ifinparttoc{#1}\relax
           \else\ifinminitoc{#2}\relax
                \else{#3}\relax
                \fi
           \fi}
\tableofcontents

\parttoc

\minitoc

\chapter{Two}
